urls.title: The Ultimate Guide to Web Design (Landing Page UI Kit + Free Bonuses)
urls.description: 🎄 Christmas Promotion - $39 $29 🎄Learn how to become an ultimate web designer - from running a freelance business to learning design theory and web design processes to mastering design handoff 📝The Ultimate Guide to Web Design is perfect for...✅ Web Designers — Learn new things about web design, practice with the Figma files, and take your skills to the next level✅ Freelance Designers — Simplify your workflow, get access to freelance documents like questionnaires, briefs, and design contracts✅ Web Developers — Learn the fundamentals of UI design, typography, color, and principles of visual perception. Don’t rely on your designers as much!✅ Every creative person — Wanting to master the craft of web design!What will you find inside? 📦This e-book is divided into 6 parts and 33 chapters, counting 340 pages. Here’s what’s included:🧳 Part 1: The Freelance GuideThe first part of this e-book will show you behind the scenes of running a freelance business. I go over my personal story, go i

data.text:
P.S. If you're interested in learning web design - check out my latest web design ebook

🎁 340+ pages, UI kits, Practice files, freelance documents, design framework, and much more! 🎁

Grab it 35% OFF this week only👇
https://t.co/C73mC2F5nY

tweets.text:
Every UX/UI designer should know these websites!

1️⃣ pixabay .com - huge collection of free images and videos
2️⃣ uidesigndaily .com - lots of free figma resources 
3️⃣ designsystems .com - a great resource for building design systems

Share it with your friends! Thanks 💙
